content: this pattern was inspired by the chance meeting and many happy moments of joy i shared with with dedri uys 1 shelley husband 2 petra creutziger 3 and susannah kate 4 who were all in sydney for the crochet guild australia conference june 2023 our sydney local yarn store morris and sons 5 organised a fun dinner for us and there were many many moments of laughter talks on crafts and life over food and a wine bottle named yarn addict the other four pockets of joy squares are here pockets of joy - shelley 6 pockets of joy - susannah 7 pockets of joy - petra 8 pockets of joy - dedri 9 my little contribution is the fifth square in the pockets of joy series and is literally that - smaller pockets of joy coming together to build a large one use literally any yarn a hook to match and use up all your scraps too as long as your heart is happy with the way you put together the colours 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/dedri-uys 2 https //www ravelry com/designers/shelley-husband 3 https //www ravelry com/designers/petra-creutziger---black-sheep-crochet 4 https //www ravelry com/designers/peppergoose-susannah-kate 5 https //www ravelry com/designers/morris--sons 6 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pockets-of-joy---shelley 7 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pockets-of-joy---susannah 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pockets-of-joy---petra 9 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pockets-of-joy---dedri
